hero.title: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGE ROUTER
hero.description: Kuanta PMR helps you resolve integration challenges by applying best practices drawn from the latest microservice messaging patterns. Its low-latency architecture and programmable messaging environment adapt seamlessly to any integration or deployment strategy you need.
hero.subTagline: Low latency and high performance, with the flexibility of full programmability.

pmr.title: PMR
pmr.description: Flexible configuration schemes and programming interfaces let you design a unified messaging architecture that responds consistently to every message.

kas.title: KAS
kas.description: A micro-application service that supports vertical and horizontal business expansion without cloud or on-premises restrictions.

broker.title: BROKER
broker.description: A Pub/Sub-based message broker with flexible topology support, high-speed processing, and reliable recovery and retransmission. Configure the broker precisely to your needs.

features.title: Features
features.tagline: Technology that leads the way in challenging environments
features.description: Explore the core features of Kuanta technology: dependable performance in fast-changing markets, a consistent messaging architecture, and flexible deployment across diverse environments without constraints. Apply it to your service landscape right away.

engineerFriendly.title: Engineer-friendly
engineerFriendly.description:
Intuitive CLI and TUI for engineers
Fast, accurate operations

integrateExisting.title: Integrate with existing systems
integrateExisting.description: Flexible integration with diverse legacy and external systems

hierarchicalDistribution.title: Hierarchical distribution & low-latency messaging
hierarchicalDistribution.description: Deliver messages quickly and reliably with system-wide technology

cards.headline: EFFICIENT TRADING SOLUTIONS
cards.title: Title
cards.description: Highlight a feature, benefit, or value of your site or product that stands strong on its own.

case1.description: Discover Kuanta’s capabilities: robust, advanced architecture for volatile markets, a consistent single messaging framework, and flexible deployment. Learn more about the core functions of Kuanta technology.
